#summary Or, how to use proprietary software to remove value from an ecosystem

= Introduction =
It's called Technical Debt, but it's the same thing that the FDA's [http://www.fda.gov/AboutFDA/CentersOffices/OfficeofMedicalProductsandTobacco/CDRH/CDRHOffices/ucm300017.htm software engineering lab] gets from static analysis.  While I doubt that there is an a priori relationship between proprietary software and technical debt...

= Details =
Let's imagine two scenarios, one involving a proprietary application that has been around for > 10 years, and one involving an open source application.
